author: Techlore
description:
Welcome to my Lunatask review, a powerful encrypted productivity app that combines to-do lists, note-taking, habit tracking, and more into a single place! I'll explore its unique features, such as intelligent task prioritization, customizable workflows, and end-to-end encryption. (as well as my issues!)

Our video on Lockdown Mode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ENuGWhz10UY
My Top 10 Privacy Tools: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zFbx-3pPVjU

Thank you to our sponsor Notesnook who offers E2EE notes in an open source ecosystem: https://notesnook.com

title: Lunatask: The Best Productivity Tool I’ve Ever Used.
